programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep2
programme.desc: Little Kisses / Snow Day - Tip busts Oh eating kitty litter and says he'll never get kissed by My Mom again./Oh and Tip help out all his friends when they freeze into Boovsicles.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged Ep54
programme.desc: Super Scraptors - SkrapIt steals the Truxs new supply of superchargers but accidentally spills them in Scraptor Valley causing the crater to be overrun with SUPER SCRAPTORS

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep14
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble's Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3
programme.desc: Boo to You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep38
programme.desc: Scare Tactics / Disturbiahhh! - Grug has Thunk use "scare tactics" to get the Valley to defend against the Broods/Eep thinks Snoot is holding Ahhh! Valleyites captive in his cave

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep39
programme.desc: Thunk O'clock High / The Croo-Gitive - Thunk must face a bully that's notorious for being an animal/The Croods flee after Grug is accused of robbing caves and stealing food for the Broods

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep40
programme.desc: A Few Good Grugs / Valley Shine Day - The Valley has the first try-all against the Croods to see if Grug stole food for the Broods; Thunk asks Kevin to teach him to be more irresistible

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep41
programme.desc: Chalk The Line / Weighting Is The Hardest Part - Eep cheats her way into being considered an adult; Grug learns he's no longer the strongest caveman and turns to a radical method for building brawn

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep42
programme.desc: Wrestlebabia: The Musica / Flowers For Munk - When Sandy can't join animal wrestling she poses as Mandy Monkhuahua; In order to help Munk, Grug sticks super worms up his nose that make him smarter

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep43
programme.desc: They Might Be Sky Giants / The Grugest Story Ever Told - After getting hit on the head, Eep has a vision and sets out to get the Valley to show how thankful they are; Grug feels like he's the biggest joke in Ahhh Valley, so he asks Thunk to make a buy-o-pic of him to show people just how truly great he is

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep13
programme.desc: Free Scauldy - Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep14
programme.desc: Frozen - During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep29
programme.desc: The Bog-ey Man of Festermouth - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Family / The House of Barbapapa - Barbapapa finds refuge in the house that Franois' parents built for him. // The house of Barbapapa is far too small now that Barbamama and the Barbabb have arrived in his life.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Hero Squad / Paddinton's Knightly Quest - Paddington, Jonathan and Judy gain super powers from a superfood cake, but are they real heroes? // Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight; but he just needs to complete three heroic quests in a day!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep121
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments - When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motor's talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the band's instruments break, Rubble & Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Wonky Wishing Wand / Bip Bip's Big Show - Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it! // Bip Bip has a concert with Tico, but he's lost! Dora and Boots have to get him to the show on time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Fruit Chews / Opera Cake - Henrys in a Snail Race! But Chef's fruit chews for Henry's mid-race snack are taking too long to set! // After learning Ruby is an amazing opera singer, Chef tries to bake a delicate Opera cake while Olly noisily builds a stage for a Stump concert.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Sharkdog's Got Talent - Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Meteor Madness - The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Pest Friends Forever - Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Blizz's Big Bite / Friend of a Friend - Baby and William help Blizzard Wizard try new foods around Carnivore Cove. // Bait gets jealous of Switch's new friend.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Swimming With The Sharks - Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups Get Skunked / Pups and a Whale of a Tale - When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale thats trapped under the ice.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk! // When Farmer Zoe's animals need some relaxation, the pups build a perfect place to practice yoga with Coach Karima.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Flying a Kite - Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Picnic - Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Musical Instruments - Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep95
programme.desc: Tiddlytubby Party - Tinky Winky finds a party invitation and shows it to Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. The invitation takes flight and the Teletubbies follow it to find a Tiddlytubbies' party.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep1
programme.desc: A - Dee encourages a friend to say 'a', and we go on an adventure around the sound. There's an astronaut, some adorable alpacas and an angry alligator!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep46
programme.desc: The Yes List - On today's poptastic adventure, it's Plom's birthday. But when Plom's expectations are a little too high, will the friends be able to give him the birthday he wants?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Bee Story - There's some funny 'buzzy-ness' going on in OKIDO. Where are all the bees? Messy and friends meet bee royalty and save the day!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Stories - Indy thinks she's no good because her model horse looks like a cow, but Calypso encourages her not to give up, so she tries to fix it with a little help from Winton.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Amazon Rain Forest, South America - Glitch wants a picnic so he stops the rain in the rainforest, upsetting the tree frogs.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Dead Sea, Middle East - The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The Show - When Bingo drops Mum's breakfast-in-bed on the floor, she's convinced she's ruined her big day. But Bluey helps make amends by putting on a play of how Mum and Dad first met.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Piggyback - The Heelers take a long riverside walk, but Bingo's legs are tired, and she wants a piggyback. To distract her, mum and dad invent fun games and get her little legs moving again.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Paraceratherium & Skin - Andymeets the largest mammal ever to walk the earth inprehistoricMongolia.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #5 (New)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #4 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: UFC 315: Muhammad vs. Della Maddalena
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Montreal, Quebec, Canada for the first time since 2015, and on May 11, fans at the Bell Centre will be treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event of UFC 315, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena. Perfect in seven trips to the Octagon, including five post-fight bonus-winning efforts, Della Maddalena is determined to bring a title down under, but in Muhammad, he will be facing a fighter who is undefeated for over six years while beating the best of the best at 170 pounds. In the co-main event, Valentina Shevchenko begins her second reign atop the flyweight division when she tackles top French contender Manon Fiorot
